posts.post_content:
Such an awesome name and artwork, wasted :(
  
   
Maybe this is just me, but i can't remember a time where [Vulshok Battlegear](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vulshok Battlegear) was part of the metagame.
  
Well, apparently it was, and therefore Wizards had to give us this strictly worse version as replacement.
